summary: This bill, the 'Successful Entrepreneurship for Reservists and Veterans Act' (SERV Act), focuses on supporting veteran and reservist entrepreneurs. It mandates the Small Business Administration to report on the veterans interagency task force, detailing its activities and outreach plans for veteran-focused programs. The bill also requires the Comptroller General to report on small business concerns owned by veterans, reservists, and their spouses, analyzing their access to credit and associated challenges.
